children.text:
Coupons

We give you access to the best coupons and deals from your favorite stores. Use our app to access thousands of online coupons and restaurant coupons, all for free. Plus, we’ve added over 80,000 new local deals! To get updates on the latest local deals, make sure you have your notifications and location enabled by checking your ShopAtHome.com app settings.


Cash Back

We want you to save as much as possible and earn your maximum Cash Back when using the ShopAtHome app. We receive a commission from retailers on purchases made through traffic sent from our app. Since we love you guys so much, we share a portion of that commission with you in the form of Cash Back. A few quick reminders:

• You must add items to your merchant shopping cart immediately after clicking from the ShopAtHome app.

• Your purchase must meet the Cash Back Terms listed on ShopAtHome.com. If you have questions on what earns Cash Back from a particular merchant, visit their store page on ShopAtHome.com and click "View Our Cash Back Terms" near the top of the page.

• You must only use coupons offered by ShopAtHome.com and only those that specifically state "plus Cash Back". Using coupons from any other source, including those sent in a merchant email or direct mail offer, those listed on other coupon or Cash Back sites, or those listed on ShopAtHome.com that do not state "plus Cash Back" will disqualify your purchase for Cash Back eligibility.


Have more questions? Visit our FAQ page for more details.
